extracurricularActivities.description: Organized and led weekly meetings, managed budgets, coordinated school-wide events such as fundraisers and student elections, and advocated for student needs in administrative meetings.
Prepared and delivered arguments for competitive debates, mentored new members, organized interschool debate competitions, and maintained the clubâ€™s schedule and resources.
Led team practices, strategized game plans with coaches, motivated teammates during high-pressure matches, and represented the team at local sports conferences.
Planned and executed community service projects, such as food drives and charity events, managed volunteer schedules, and promoted service initiatives within the school community.

essays.essayAboutAnimals: Animals are the most adorable and loving creatures existing on Earth. They might not be able to speak, but they can understand. They have a unique mode of interaction which is beyond human understanding.
essays.essayAboutSchool: A school is the educational institution (and, in the case of in-person learning, the building) designed to provide learning environments for the teaching of students, usually under the direction of teachers.
